body: I've read too many shittily translated chinese manhua the brain rot inducing type of stuff. It has granted me powers to see panels of art into a movie inside my head. If what I think happened is the real story of this doujin. I think this is one of the top tier doujins out there. This is some SSS+ level in my tierlist.... Next to.... 177013

To sum it all up. gal exorted the nerd during their highschool days. skip to some years later. the nerd turned into a rich dude, while the gal has turned into a struggling single mother raising this girl all alone by herself cuz the father didn't take responsibility. I think the daughter of that gal is already doing the compensated dating thing with the nerd. Thus why he was at the school. Then gal and nerd sees each other again(nerd ask for payback?return the cash she extorted?) and due to her circumstances she's strapped for cash thus why she prostituted herself.
So if I read this correct the daughter was already fucking him
Kinda hope this might ended up in a romantic way, but having that revengeful ending is still okay i think
Lol someone get this translated asap fakku is gonna be here any minute
Always love a good revenge story
Wow that's revenge, he fucked his bully and now the daughter is next
Wait. Prolly misreading but did he/is he gonna fuck the daughter in the end? If so damn that is ice cold. Karmas a bitch tho ig lol
